text: Starting with 2.2.9, any query string in the substitution is lost with flags [proxy, noescape]
creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
Tom.Donovan@acm.org
text: Thanks to Matt Grossman for pointing out this bug.

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: *** Bug 45567 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Tom,

Would like to request that this gets backported.

Mark Dierolf

(In reply to comment #1)
> Fixed in trunk - r670061
>
creator: mdierolf@financialcontent.com

text:
Mark,

I proposed this fix for backport to the 2.2 branch.  
See the 2.2 STATUS file.  It needs 3 votes to get backported.

If it doesn't get these after a reasonable amount of time (usually a few weeks), you might want to raise the subject on the dev@httpd.apache.org mailing list.

-tom-
creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org

text: *** Bug 45581 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
nick@webthing.com
text: This is fixedintrunk, not fixed.  Given two duplicates in as many days, it should really be kept open here so people find it as such!

creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
text:
It seems I already proposed this for backport 6 weeks ago 
   ... and forgot that I did so - doh!

It is backported to 2.2 now.

-tom-
